BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Paterson, S.5305, and Committee on Rules, A.8701, "AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey title of certain property to Gus Jenkins ".
Items.MatterName: Reconvey title of certain property to Gus Jenkins (S.5305, A.8701)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Padavan, Golden, Maltese, Marchi and Velella, S.2564-B, and Assembly Members Abbate, Colton, Cymbrowitz, Ortiz, Pheffer, Seddio, Seminerio and McLaughlin, et al, A.5464-B, "AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a twenty year retirement program for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as investigators by district attorneys' offices".
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a twenty year retirement program for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as investigators by district attorneys' offices (S.2564-B, A.5464-B)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
